__TOC__

EC2 is the Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud, providing scalable virtual private servers using Xen. This page has been setup for information on creating Ubuntu images for EC2.

Official images for Hardy and Intrepid are now available. For more details:
* <nowiki>[[EC2FAQ|FAQ about Ubuntu on EC2]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[EC2StartersGuide|Ubuntu on EC2 Starters Guide]]</nowiki>

See also:
* http://cloud.ubuntu.com

* <nowiki>[[EC2-VNC]]</nowiki> running graphics programmes with VNC
